summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Live Sessions WebSocket and API features. All 16 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed for live room chat, reactions, and hand raise features.

integration_issues.issue: The /lives page shows 'No Live Streams' even when live sessions exist. This is because it fetches from /api/live-rooms (different endpoint) instead of /api/live-sessions. These are two separate features.

critical_code_review_comments: LiveKit WebRTC audio is MOCKED - returns mock_mode=true because LIVEKIT_API_KEY, LIVEKIT_API_SECRET, LIVEKIT_URL are not configured
The /lives page uses /api/live-rooms endpoint while live sessions use /api/live-sessions - these are separate features
test_credentials: No credentials required - anonymous users can join live rooms
context_for_next_testing_agent: Live Sessions WebSocket features fully tested and working. Test file at /app/tests/test_live_sessions.py covers: session CRUD, WebSocket connection, chat messages, emoji reactions, hand raise/lower, ping/pong heartbeat, multi-user broadcast. LiveKit audio is mocked (no keys configured).

frontend_ui: Live room page loads with LIVE badge ✅
Chat input and send button work ✅

mocked_apis.LiveKit: Token endpoint returns mock_mode=true - audio features disabled
